targets.query:
from(bucket: "srsran")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "ue_count")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["testbed"] == "default")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> last()

panels.description: It represents the number of antennas in use

targets.query:
from(bucket: "srsran")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "ue_info")  
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["testbed"] == "default")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "ri")

panels.title: RI (Rank Indicator)

from(bucket: "srsran")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "ue_info")  
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["testbed"] == "default")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "dl_mcs")

from(bucket: "srsran")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "ue_info")  
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["testbed"] == "default")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "dl_mcs")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
    r with 
    category: if r._value >= 0 and r._value <= 14 then 2
              else if r._value >= 15 and r._value <= 20 then 4
              else if r._value >= 21 and r._value <= 28 then 6
              else if r._value == 29 then 2
              else if r._value == 30 then 4
              else 6 }))

from(bucket: "srsran")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "ul_mcs")

  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "ue_info")  
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["testbed"] == "default")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "ul_mcs")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
    r with 
    category: if r._value >= 0 and r._value <= 14 then 2
              else if r._value >= 15 and r._value <= 20 then 4
              else if r._value >= 21 and r._value <= 28 then 6
              else if r._value == 29 then 2
              else if r._value == 30 then 4
              else 6 }))

from(bucket: "srsran")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "ue_info")  
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["testbed"] == "default")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "dl_mcs")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
    r with 
    category: if r._value == 0 then 30
              else if r._value == 1 then 40
              else if r._value == 2 then 50
              else if r._value == 3 then 64
              else if r._value == 4 then 78
              else if r._value == 5 then 99
              else if r._value == 6 then 120
              else if r._value == 7 then 157
              else if r._value == 8 then 193
              else if r._value == 9 then 251
              else if r._value == 10 then 308
              else if r._value == 11 then 379
              else if r._value == 12 then 449
              else if r._value == 13 then 526
              else if r._value == 14 then 602
              else if r._value == 15 then 340
              else if r._value == 16 then 378
              else if r._value == 17 then 434
              else if r._value == 18 then 490
              else if r._value == 19 then 553
              else if r._value == 20 then 616
              else if r._value == 21 then 438
              else if r._value == 22 then 466
              else if r._value == 23 then 517
              else if r._value == 24 then 567
              else if r._value == 25 then 616
              else if r._value == 26 then 666
              else if r._value == 27 then 719
              else 772}))

from(bucket: "srsran")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "ue_info")  
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["testbed"] == "default")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "dl_mcs")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
    r with 
    category: if r._value == 0 then 0.0586
              else if r._value == 1 then 0.0781
              else if r._value == 2 then 0.0977
              else if r._value == 3 then 0.1250
              else if r._value == 4 then 0.1523
              else if r._value == 5 then 0.1934
              else if r._value == 6 then 0.2344
              else if r._value == 7 then 0.3066
              else if r._value == 8 then 0.3770
              else if r._value == 9 then 0.4902
              else if r._value == 10 then 0.6016
              else if r._value == 11 then 0.7402
              else if r._value == 12 then 0.8770
              else if r._value == 13 then 1.0273
              else if r._value == 14 then 1.1758
              else if r._value == 15 then 1.3281
              else if r._value == 16 then 1.4766
              else if r._value == 17 then 1.6953
              else if r._value == 18 then 1.9141
              else if r._value == 19 then 2.1602
              else if r._value == 20 then 2.4063
              else if r._value == 21 then 2.5664
              else if r._value == 22 then 2.7305
              else if r._value == 23 then 3.0293
              else if r._value == 24 then 3.3223
              else if r._value == 25 then 3.6094
              else if r._value == 26 then 3.9023
              else if r._value == 27 then 4.2129
              else 4.5234}))
